endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available leisure events for booking.
Book a specific leisure event based on user selection.
Retrieve details about available tours for selection.
Schedule and book a tour for the user.
View the personalized itinerary created by the user.
Complete the payment for booked events and tours.
Provide feedback and reviews for leisure activities.
Retrieve notifications and updates for booked activities.
Cancel and remove an item from the itinerary list.
